author: CyandraZ
title: Another fun PC included exclusive.
review: Okay, so the train car's boring, but it does include the rare axle compatable train wheels, and it also includes an exclusive figure: the Super Station Master! Okay, so he's a bit cheesy, but I like the idea of the lego world having it's own unique superheroes, this being one of them. And the Timmy look-alike is fun, and has a face that's good for child minifigures in your town. Plus, it's free, so it's fine, if not spectacular. 4/5

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Trains - Track Buggy with Station Master and Cool Kid
review:
The Track Buggy with Station Master and Cool Kid (2585) is a LEGO Trains set which came out in 1998. It comes with 2 minifigs and 32 pieces. This set does include no decals and there're no mistakes in the instructions and no missing pieces.

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/2585-1.jpg[/img]


Minifigures:

Railway Employee: The railway eployee comes with a yellow uniform, yellow pants, red hands and a red hat. On his face you can see the old LEGO smiley face with a beard. You can get one extra head with a red mask and a red cape which makes this minifig very unique.


Kid: The kid comes with a red cap, blue pants and a cool white shirt with a red LEGO brick on it. The face is the same which I've seen in the LEGO Time Cruisers - Rocket Racer set: We get black hair, big eyes, and a small nose. This minifig is also unique and you can only find this guy in this set.


Handcar:

The handcar is very easy to build and a nice starter set. There's only one play feature in this set: we get two levers which do sviwel. This set doesn't include any tracks but it fits on tracks very nice. Please note: there're NO rails included in this set!

This set came as an extra with the videogame 'LEGO Loco'. It's a nice set to have and I'm sure that you won't need longer than 5 minutes to build that model.



Positive:

Great pieces which you can use for brickfilms or MOC's
Minifigs are unique
No stickers
Nice starter set


Negative:

No play features
Too easy to build




All in all this set is a good model and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full galery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
